results.title: Metformin inhibits salivary adenocarcinoma growth through cell cycle arrest and apoptosis.
results.text_hl: For the first time, the inhibitory effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Salivary_Gland_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012468 @@@salivary gland tumor@@@ cells was documented.
